name: Overview
data: [{"id":"99226509-d7a3-4af1-97e4-fa0c2ffe3875","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"File Overview: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4f2b703a-3d1c-45dc-ac04-fd9b4ae47160","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module is a vital component of the Jarvis analysis engine, responsible for recording and organizing every function and method invocation encountered during code traversal. While other modules focus on where code is defined, this module focuses on where code is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"used","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b1b59f6c-946b-4112-8362-adccc128fed0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In static analysis, tracking call sites is the only way to perform ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"interprocedural analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"—the process of following data as it leaves one function and enters another. This module provides the infrastructure to build a comprehensive map of these execution links.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da9d0a7a-0899-434e-aaf9-61f017bea9ed","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7cc3a0dc-7924-4497-a105-13f6474b94de","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and Role","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fc93ef89-8f93-46d6-a75d-2fefcd3b242d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary goal of this module is to maintain a chronological record of program execution flow:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2b9d0eea-c7f8-474b-aa6e-621443aa1d80","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call Site Tracking","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It records the exact \"geographic\" coordinates (file line numbers) where a function is called.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dee75de1-6075-467d-a0cc-0d3c1d79ef8f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Order Preservation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It ensures that function calls are tracked in the exact order they appear, even when multiple calls occur on the same line (such as nested calls).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"496f12c2-7a04-427a-8328-62d6fad1453e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Argument Capture","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It bundles the values and variables passed into a call, allowing the engine to map them to the parameters of the target function later.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"29f9cfa6-7274-459a-a415-225345f2d68a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Association","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It links every call to its \"Caller\" (the namespace it originated from) and its \"Callee\" (the function being targeted).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ff7ba4f8-f15a-43f0-a770-2aa8332d6101","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"90510e02-60a6-4512-a792-73ec3a4fe911","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c254852a-3f10-4c12-81fd-d4ee4fb028da","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Orchestrator)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4568e31b-1f0e-4fff-a0e6-f3356ad80109","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the central registry for all call events. It uses a dictionary to group calls by the namespace in which they occur. It utilizes a global sequence counter (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to guarantee a unique, monotonic order for every call recorded across the entire project. This ensures that the analysis follows the logic path exactly as written.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a3e5d8d3-b361-474e-bbc1-5ac2ffeb5df5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (The Call Record)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ee0c1c7c-69ca-49db-9351-ec5243cd74c6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a data container representing a single invocation. It holds the metadata for the call, including the targeted function, the provided arguments, and its position in the execution timeline. Most importantly, it implements comparison logic (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__lt__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") that allows the system to sort calls by line number and sequence.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7c7f3235-a23c-41eb-be8d-e2e9a42e8aaa","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"f56ecc0a-18aa-4002-a60c-10a56a03421a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"System Integration & Relationship","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7c8861a4-c0b7-4d81-902c-da9280c09b1f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module acts as a \"flight recorder\" for the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e63d09f-0ed4-4322-abc1-ff1461fa44b0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"During Traversal","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As the engine walks the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST), every time it encounters a function call (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"process(data)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it notifies the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c5876688-0cc4-441d-9ebd-bd5b594e5c25","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"During Data-Flow Analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the engine finishes analyzing a scope, it retrieves the heap of calls from the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It then \"steps into\" each call in order, carrying the pointer values from the call site into the target function's definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e498a3ae-9721-4884-b1df-b001d27ba76b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call Graph Construction","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The data collected here provides the raw material needed to generate a call graph, showing the relationships and dependencies between different parts of the application.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"53e5fe1d-91d2-4c82-b7b9-d09406c66f6c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b7af326d-fce7-4c5f-a8c2-a784cbd9f9ca","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Brief Insight / Tutorial","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c80bf21c-5bef-48df-9932-b9c5fe52b305","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Recording a Nested Call","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"af4b2e63-452f-493a-9f1a-3f1922b4d7a9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consider the code: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"print(validate(get_input()))","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7d7cac9-e3c8-4675-b0a6-3d918f54806b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Discovery","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The parser sees the calls. Because ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_input()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must execute before ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" assigns them sequential IDs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b3fa2bac-7eaa-4e16-8ad7-fa2a05f03cae","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Registration","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"bdb8c311-5e29-4353-a857-e93c3461a292","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call 1: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_input","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (seq: 10, row: 5)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e3c07c2-afa3-4fd0-99d5-b982acffa284","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call 2: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (seq: 11, row: 5)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"312b7ae3-bae6-4fba-9471-a7a4f4faca76","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Call 3: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"print","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (seq: 12, row: 5)","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"8abc1d42-ce50-44f1-b990-e1401f75ed43","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the analyzer looks at line 5, it pops these from the heap in order. It processes the result of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_input","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", passes it as a parameter to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and finally passes that result to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"print","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1b963ef7-fa1c-463a-8f48-c94b303856f0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This level of detail ensures that Jarvis can accurately trace data through complex, single-line expressions without losing track of the execution order.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0e202df-dc15-4595-bdf5-3bdaee59a939","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
